DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety profile , tolerability , pharmacokinetics single oral dos 10 mg 1200 mg BMS-830216 ( pro-drug BMS-819881 ) healthy subject
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Evaluate BMS-830216 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject determine medical history , physical examination , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory evaluation eligible participate study Women childbearing potential ( i.e. , postmenopausal surgically sterile ) men age 18 45 Evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal physical examination , vital sign , ECG clinical laboratory determination
